page.title: 05 LEISURE
page.content: We asked a number of people how they spent their{leisure}time. The most popular{leisure}time activity was going out places. In second place was going to pubs. In third was gardening. Fourth was swimming. Fifth was knitting. In sixth place was fishing, biking, playing computers, playing games, going to the library and reading. Also there was one person who played golf, went birdwatching or shooting. We did about 60 interviews 23 people answered, 37 refused. Some people spent money on what they did, others did not. Some people had lots of things to do, others just the one.
